name: Treasure Hunt: Dog Days
description:
Help Captain Clown Nose to survive and raid the treasure of PalmIsland. Beware of Hidden Spikkes and Crusty Crabs ! Collect as many coins and diamonds you could !
ENJOY ! HOW TO PLAY -


Use  A & D Keys to move around.
Press Space Bar Repeatedly to JUMP HIGHER.
Press Left Mouse Button to Attack.

NOTE - USE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION FOR BEST EXPERIENCE. WEB GL VERSION MIGHT HAVE SOME GLITCHES. CREDITS -
Tools Used -


Unity 2020.3.7f1.
Photoshop 2021


ASSETS USED - 


Art Assets By Pixel Frog - https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/treasure-hunters

Sounds - 

Pixelland by Kevin MacLeod
License - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Sword Sounds By - Merrick079
License - https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/

Death SFX by - Replix
License - https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/

Rest all the programming and level design is done by me.


Note - It has fewer levels because I made this game only in 5 days.
THANKS!
